data.title: Estée Lauder Companies Tech Day of Pink
data.meta_description: Inspired by The EstÃ©e Lauder Companiesâ (ELC) Breast Cancer Campaign, which was founded in 1992 by the late Evelyn H. Lauder, Tech Day of Pink is an initiative dedicated to mobilizing the global tech community to help create a breast cancer-free world.
data.text:
DONATE

The donation page to the Breast Cancer Research FoundationÂ® at the Tech Day of Pink is coming soon.

Breakthroughs in breast cancer treatment and prevention come from research and education initiatives. With your support, we will be even closer to creating a breast cancer-free world. The EstÃ©e Lauder Companies (ELC) is known around the world as a leader in the fight against breast cancer. Together, ELC and The EstÃ©e Lauder Companies Charitable Foundation Breast Cancer Campaign, has funded more than $118 million globally for lifesaving research, education, and medical services, with more than $93 million funding medical research grants through the Breast Cancer Research FoundationÂ® (BCRF). At the link below, you will have the option to donate directly or create your own unique fundraising page, which you can share with your networks to make the most impact. The link will attribute your company and Tech Day of Pink to the donation.

Last year, Tech Day of Pink raised an outstanding $170,715 for BCRF, before matching, through our benefit concert, silent auction, walkathon, and more. We had over 100 companies participate.

On behalf of The EstÃ©e Lauder Companies, thank you for joining in our mission to help create a breast cancer-free world. Together, we are accelerating our progress towards a more equitable and beautiful future for the breast cancer community and beyond.
